parameter-group.name: thing-base-config
parameter-group.label: Base HTTP Configuration
parameter-group.description: Base configuration for options related to the HTTP request itself.

parameter-group.name: thing-state-config
parameter-group.label: Base State Configuration
parameter-group.description: Base configuration for options related to fetching state.

parameter-group.name: thing-command-config
parameter-group.label: Base Command Configuration
parameter-group.description: Base configuration for options related to sending commands.

parameter.name: baseUrl
parameter.label: Base URL
parameter.description: The base URL used to acess information about this Thing. Individual channels may specify a URL suffix that will be appended to the base URL.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Optional username to use for HTTP Basic authentication.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Optional password to use for HTTP Basic authentication.

parameter.name: stateRefreshInterval
parameter.label: State Refresh Interval (ms)
parameter.description: How often (in milliseconds) to refresh state by fetching the State URL.

parameter.name: commandMethod
parameter.label: Command HTTP Method
parameter.description: HTTP Method to use when sending a command to a channel.

parameter.name: commandContentType
parameter.label: Command Content Type
parameter.description: The content type to use when sending a command to a channel.

parameter-group.name: state-config
parameter-group.label: State Configuration
parameter-group.description: Configuration for options related to fetching state for this channel.

parameter.name: urlSuffix
parameter.label: URL Suffix
parameter.description: Suffix appended to the Thing's Base URL for requests on this channel.

parameter.name: stateResponseTransform
parameter.label: State Response Transformation
parameter.description: A transformation rule used to transform the HTTP response from the State URL.

parameter-group.name: state-config
parameter-group.label: State Configuration
parameter-group.description: Configuration for options related to fetching state for this channel.

parameter-group.name: command-config
parameter-group.label: Command Configuration
parameter-group.description: Configuration for options related to sending commands on this channel.

parameter.name: urlSuffix
parameter.label: URL Suffix
parameter.description: Suffix appended to the Thing's Base URL for requests on this channel.

parameter.name: stateResponseTransform
parameter.label: State Response Transformation
parameter.description: A transformation rule used to transform the HTTP response from the State URL.

parameter.name: commandRequestTransform
parameter.label: Command Request Transformation
parameter.description: A transformation rule used to transform the command before it is sent to the Command URL.

parameter.name: commandResponseTransform
parameter.label: Command Response Transformation
parameter.description: A transformation rule used to transform the HTTP response from the Command URL.
